Line 3: Line 3:
The Flag of [[Billings, Montana]] was originally designed in 1986. Its design includes the city seal between two dark purple bars on either side.
The Flag of [[Billings, Montana]] was originally designed in 1986. Its design includes the city seal between two dark purple bars on either side.
â
In 2004 [[North American Vexillological Association|NAVA]] conducted an internet survey of city flags across the US and Billings' old and current flag ranked 106th place/3.35 points on a 0-10 scale/D+.<ref>http://www.nava.org/Flag%20Design/City%20Survey%202004/acf_press_release.htm</ref>
+
